data = _getWorkflowStaticData('global')
webhook_payload = _input.first().json
if webhook_payload and 'body' in webhook_payload and 'event_data' in webhook_payload['body']:
    data['webhook_task'] = webhook_payload['body']['event_data']
return [{}]

parameters.content:
## Todoist Template Expander (recursive)
Finds `!! TemplateName` tasks, deletes the placeholder, and clones the matching template (including all subtasks) into the **same project & section** as the placeholder. Creation is serialized with Split In Batches (size 1) so parent/child order is preserved.
